'''1.19.53''' is a minor update to {{el|ee}}, released on June 26, 2023, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230628082941/https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/13961617817236|title=What's New in The Wild Update (v1.19.53)|website=Minecraft Education Support}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Technical ===
* Improved multiplayer stability. 

== Fixes ==
* Fixed {{cmd|give camera}} issue.
* Fixed <code>nativeclient</code> error on login for some organizations on iOS and iPadOS.
